titles.title: Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area Act of 2009
To establish the Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

bill.summary: Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area Act of 2009 - Establishes the Cache La Poudre River National Heritage Area in Colorado. Designates the Poudre Heritage Alliance, a nonprofit, as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Alliance to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Area.
